Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスの思念か……<Yellow>ヒト<White>に取り付くなんてよ、 まったく執念深いヤツだぜ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Geyorkias's Will... The fact that it's taken over <Yellow>Humanity<White> must mean it's pretty damn relentless...!

Entry.JapaneseText: もしかしたら<Blue>落日<White>は、ラドラス王が ゲオルギアスを復活させようとして……
Entry.EnglishText: Could it be that on the <Blue>Dusk<White>, King Ladras was trying to resurrect Geyorkias...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……じゃあ、何か！ 国王がヒューマを 滅ぼそうとしてたって事かよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, what?! Does that mean the king was trying to exterminate Huma?!
...Could it be that Queen Agarte was trying to as well...?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなはずがない。……そんな事をお考えに なるような方たちではない。断じて……
Entry.EnglishText: That can't be. They were not the sort of people who would hold such convictions. Of that, I am certain...
